objectives: Students will discuss food and dining out using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to food and dining out
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining food and dining out content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore food and dining out through a Historical lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving food and dining out

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to food and dining out in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about food and dining out using neutral register
Students create original historical themed content about food and dining out in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe food and dining out in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in food and dining out?
Can you create a Historical story about food and dining out?
How does food and dining out change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving food and dining out
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in historical context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within historical theme

topic_genre_blend: food and dining out with tradition
food and dining out with heritage
food and dining out with legacy

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
